Public Remarks: Picture driving home from a long day to a refuge you call HOME; riding beneath a lush canopy of majestic oak and elm trees to one of Silicon Valley's most desirable neighborhoods - Willow Glen! Custom-built by Greg Mussalem in 2010 there are 4 bedrooms and 3.5 baths. You'll love the grand entrance, high ceilings, lots of natural sunlight, neutral tones, spacious open concept floor plan including a gourmet kitchen and butler's pantry. Chef's Kitchen includes a 6-burner stove top, two ovens, granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances for both style and function. The backyard has lush fruit trees, the front yard, a drought-tolerant garden. Many high-end upgrades are solar panels, a central vacuum, custom closets and workbench in the garage, a built-in desk in the primary bedroom, and a 240-volt car charger. A short stroll to downtown Willow Glen includes many shops, restaurants, Farmer's Market, several parks and schools, including Booksin Elementary. This home is a must see!

Public Remarks: Introducing the latest offering from Aro Homes, an innovative new home builder working to push the new home building industry towards a more sustainable future. Designed by world-renowned architectural firm Olson Kundig (Burke Museum, Space Needle Century Project), and built by oft-awarded Napa-based contractor Cello & Maudru (Art House, Faust Haus), this home combines a warm modern aesthetic emphasizing indoor/outdoor living with superior engineering & materials to deliver a luxury product that significantly reduces the cost of ownership. Equipped with a full suite of green features, including 24 solar fully-paid solar panels, smart home controls, SPAN electrical panels, high-r dual pane windows, whole-house energy recovery ventilator, Unico high-velocity HVAC system, and plumbing for greywater system. Beyond the energy-saving features, you will find this home fitted with premium finishes throughout. Featuring a chefs kitchen with quartz countertops, waterfall island, stainless Dacor appliances and sleek flat-panel cabinetry; quad panel Cascadia sliding doors bathing the living room in natural light while connecting it to the spacious back deck and yard; a luxurious primary suite, dedicated laundry room, and so much more.
Showing Instruction: Appointment Only,Call Listing Agent

Wide plank Oak doors throughout with floor to ceiling windows. Ceilings throughout range from 10 to 24 ft., abundance of light in every room! Porcelanosa tiles and floating cabinetry in all baths! Primary suite features an elegant freestanding tub & designer closets. Modern glass railings throughout. But wait, there is an ADU with kitchenette and separate entry! This home is not a flip, it is built from the 12-foot Piers/Beam foundation up. The quality of this home is nothing short of inspiring.

Located on a beautiful tree lined street, this home is an easy stroll to downtown shops and dining. This is a must see!

Public Remarks: Situated in the heart of Willow Glen on a beautiful tree-lined street - within the Booksin Elementary School Boundary. This completely remodeled home features a fantastic open floor plan. As you walk through the front door you are greeted by a formal living area with gleaming hardwood floors, plentiful amounts of natural light flowing through the windows, and a fireplace. Living room leads directly to the kitchen and dining areas - truly an entertainer's delight. Updated kitchen with newer cabinetry, newer countertops, and high-end appliances. Huge Primary Bedroom w/ en-suite bathroom and large walk-in closet. Built in Speakers and Subwoofer. Double Pane Windows. Newer Furnace / AC. Tankless Water Heater. Recessed Lighting. Water Softener. Too many upgrades to list! Peaceful backyard area with lawn space and mature landscaping. Bonus space attached to garage perfect for home office, gym, or yoga. Close to Downtown Willow Glen shopping and restaurants! It's time to make this your HOME!

Public Remarks: Stunning 4 bedroom, 4 bathroom home custom-built by Urban Pacific Homes. Boasts a sleek, contemporary design that seamlessly integrates form & function. Open-concept living space & kitchen perfect for entertaining. Sleek kitchen is chef's dream, with high end appliances, custom cabinetry & large island. Second flex area can be a family room, formal dining room, office space or children's play room. Large bedroom & full bathroom on first level perfect for guests or work from home. Primary suite features walk-in closet & luxurious bathroom with dual vanities, large shower & soaking tub. The additional 2 bedrooms provide ample space for family & guests each with their own bathroom. The large laundry room is conveniently located near the bedrooms. This home features high-end finishes & luxurious amenities throughout. There is a perfect space for an ADU above the garage as well. Located in the heart of Willow Glen, this stunning home is just minutes from shopping, dining & entertainment.
